features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create professional business plans

ai.title: AI-Powered Content Generation
ai.description: Our advanced AI generates customized business plan content based on your inputs and industry standards.

time.title: Save Valuable Time
time.description: Create comprehensive business plans in hours instead of weeks with our intuitive platform.

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of industry-specific templates designed by business experts.

financial.title: Financial Projections
financial.description: Generate realistic financial forecasts with our easy-to-use financial modeling tools.

collaboration.title: Seamless Collaboration
collaboration.description: Invite team members, stakeholders, or advisors to review and contribute to your plan.

questionnaire.title: Guided Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Our step-by-step questionnaire helps you articulate your business vision clearly and comprehensively.
